Welcome to ProEQ’s documentation!¶

Install Development¶

virtualenv .env
pip install -e
echo 'eval "$(_PROEQ_COMPLETE=source proeq)"' << ~/.bashrc

Create User Folder¶

Use the following structure:

  • .proeq
    • scripts
      • script-one
        • manifest.yml
      • ...
    • projects
      • project-one
        • project.yml
      • ...
